welcoming_message: Your welcoming message, which is displayed when the bot joins the server

discord.bot_private_key: PRIVATE KEY OF YOUR DISCORD BOT
discord.bot_channel_id: CHANNEL ID WHERE PEOPLE WILL RECIEVE MESSAGES FROM THE BOT

static_text.help_command: ?discord - discord server; ?quote - your random quote, ?playtime - your playtime, ?jd - joindate; ?fm - your first message, ?seen <player> - when a player was last seen. More commands in discord: ?discord
static_text.report_command: Reported {player} for {reason}! Staff will review this ASAP.
static_text.discord_command: woooo join this epic server right here -> {link}
